discover_best_chefs: Discover the Best Chefs in Your Area
discover_best_chefs_desc: Fresh homemade food, made just for you and delivered to your door.
search_placeholder: Search for a chef or cuisine...
no_chefs_available: No chefs are available right now.
wait_for_chefs: Please check back soon, new chefs might join!
this_chef_has_no_dishes: This chef has not added any dishes yet.
no_reviews_for_dish: No reviews for this dish yet.
chef_is_currently_closed_desc: Sorry, this chef is not accepting new orders at the moment.
login_required_desc: Please log in or create a new account to complete your order.
delivery_information_desc: Your order will be delivered to this address.
chef_is_busy_desc: You can complete your order, and it will be placed in a queue.
track_your_current_orders: Track the status of your current orders.
no_orders_yet: You haven't placed any orders yet.
no_orders_yet_desc: Looks like you haven't ordered anything yet. Go explore the delicious dishes available!
community_chat_desc: Connect with other food lovers and share your experiences.
no_messages_yet: No messages yet. Be the first to start a conversation!
must_be_customer_to_chat: You must be a customer to participate in the chat.
chef_login_desc: Welcome back! Manage your orders here.
forgot_password_desc_sent: If the email exists, you will receive a reset link.
forgot_password_desc_initial: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
feature_unavailable_desc_localstorage: This feature is not supported in local storage mode. It will be enabled when connected to a real database.
customer_signup_desc: Fill in your details to enjoy the best meals.
chef_signup_desc: Share your culinary creations and earn extra income.
no_reviews_yet: No reviews have been submitted yet.
no_new_orders: You have no new orders pending review.
no_completed_orders: You have not completed any orders yet.
menu_management_desc: Add, edit, and manage the visibility of your dishes.
your_menu_is_empty_desc: Start by adding your delicious dishes to attract customers.
coupon_management_desc: Create and manage discount coupons to attract more customers.
no_coupons_desc: Create coupons to offer discounts and special deals.
profile_desc: Update your profile information and preferences.
bio_placeholder: Tell customers about yourself and your passion for cooking...
change_password_desc: Choose a strong and secure password.
logout_desc: Are you sure you want to log out?
password_db_desc: This page shows registered users for demonstration purposes only. In a real application, this would not be exposed.
name: Name
validation_email_must_start_with_letter: Email must start with a letter.
auth_incorrect_credentials: The email or password you entered is incorrect.
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
auth_email_in_use: This email address is already in use.
auth_password_requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number, and a symbol.
profile_updated_desc: Your information has been saved successfully.
update_error_desc: We could not save your changes. Please try again.
pending_orders_desc: You have {{count}} orders waiting for your approval. Check them in your dashboard.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_update: You must be logged in to update your profile.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_change_passwor: You must be logged in to change your password.
password_changed_toast_desc: Your password has been updated successfully.
password_change_failed_toast_desc: Please check the information and try again.
new_chef_bio: A passionate chef specializing in {{specialty}}, dedicated to providing high-quality dishes.
no_links_allowed: Sending links is not allowed in the chat.
order_error_desc: Please log in and add an address to be able to complete the order.
order_sent_toast_waitlisted_desc: Your order has been placed in the chef's waitlist.
order_sent_toast_review_desc: {{quantity}} x {{dishName}} is now under review by the chef.
coupon_limit_reached_error: The usage limit for this coupon has been reached.
coupon_not_applicable_error: This coupon is not applicable to this dish.
order_waitlisted_notification_desc: Your order for {{dishName}} is on the waitlist as the chef is busy.
new_waitlisted_order_notification_desc: You have a new waitlisted order from {{customerName}}.
order_confirmed_notification_desc: The chef has started preparing your {{dishName}}.
order_on_the_way_notification_title: Your order is on the way!
order_on_the_way_notification_desc: Your {{dishName}} is on its way to you now.
order_delivered_notification_desc: Enjoy your meal! Don't forget to rate your {{dishName}}.
order_rejected_notification_desc: We're sorry, your order for {{dishName}} was rejected by the chef.
dish_description_placeholder: Describe your dish in an appealing way for customers...
dish_ingredients_placeholder: e.g., Rice, Pasta, Lentils, Chickpeas, Tomato Sauce
price_positive: Price must be a positive number.
prep_time_positive: Prep time must be a positive number.
must_be_chef: You must be a chef to perform this action.
dish_updated_toast_desc: The dish '{{name}}' has been updated successfully.
dish_added_toast_desc: The dish '{{name}}' has been added to your menu.
delete_dish_warning: This will permanently delete the dish '{{name}}'. This action cannot be undone.
coupon_code_min_length: Code must be at least 3 characters long.
coupon_code_alphanumeric: Code must contain only alphanumeric characters.
discount_value_positive: Discount value must be a positive number.
usage_limit_min: Usage limit must be at least 1.
specific_dishes_desc: Select the dishes this coupon applies to.
no_dishes_to_add: You have no dishes to add to a coupon.
end_date_after_start_date: End date must be after start date.
select_one_dish_for_specific: Please select at least one dish.
caption_max_length: Caption must be 150 characters or less.
file_too_large_desc: Please select a file smaller than {{size}}.
status_management_desc: Add a temporary visual status for your customers to see.
delete_status_warning: This will permanently delete your active status. This action cannot be undone.
no_active_status_desc: Share a snapshot of your kitchen moments!
